update.name: log4shell-hunter
update.description: Scanner that scans local files for log4shell vulnerability. Does bytecode analysis so it does not rely on metadata. Will find vulnerable log4j even it has been self-compiled/repackaged/shaded/nested (e.g. uberjar, fatjar) and even obfuscated.

update.name: CVE-2025-44603-CSRF-Leads_to_Create_FakeUsers
update.description: CSRF can create fake users by tricking an authenticated user into submitting a malicious request. The web app trusts the session, allowing unauthorized account creation, leading to privilege escalation or spam. Mitigation includes CSRF tokens, Same Site cookies, and authentication checks like CAPTCHAs.

update.name: CVE-2025-24893
update.description: PoC exploits CVE-2025-24893 , a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in XWiki caused by improper sandboxing in Groovy macros rendered asynchronously. It allows arbitrary command execution through injection into RSS-based SolrSearch endpoints.
